Material is a little thinner than expected, but surprisingly good quality. different material on under sleeve (almost silky) which gives it a droopy look unlike the photos. Striped over sleeve is pretty long, size is a smaller than other XL shirts. Love the way the neckline sits because it doesn’t show my collarbone and I don’t like when shirts show the collar bone,  it it might be to small for the size so idk. I also like the the under sleeve goes all the up to the shoulder and isn’t just sewn to the striped sleeve, so props to that. Overall I would recommend the one without the under sleeve cause they don’t look like the photos, and also size up cause they run a little small.

评论概述: Very manly, basically what I wanted
评论详情: I’m going to start this off by saying I’m trans, I present masculine and I’ve been trying to grow my closet to me more guy-like. I was looking for a baggy, long, masculine shirt and I got that. Shirt quality is surprisingly high and I love the pattern and colors, they are exactly what I ordered. The sizing is pretty decent too, it’s long. Both in the body and sleeves, which I’m incredibly happy about. It’s perfect for sleeve cuffing and tucking in. My only issue with the shirt is it seems a bit boxy, but it’s not even noticeable or an issue. Overall, I’m really happy about this shirt and just based on this one, I’d probably buy more.

评论概述: Sized up for the oversized look, but the proportions are still weird
评论详情: I am 5'6" and 115lbs and ordered a large to get the sized up look. The placement of the shoulder seams are way too broad and slump down to my biceps, so the shoulder sleeve STARTS midway down my arm for some reason. The collar is higher and tighter than I expected. I hoped it would show a least a LITTLE of my neck and collarbone, but no. Then the black shirt part is too small, so it doesn't look wide and bottom heavy like the photo does. The actual shirt length is what I wanted, but the sleeves are just so odd looking. It doesn't look like, cute oversized and ariana grande style sleeves, they're just kinda frumpy and odd. IDK. It's not the worst thing ever, the quality itself seems passable and it's comfortable, lightweight, and soft. I'm going to try maybe sewing the tshirt sleeve seam higher and then pulling and stretching out the longsleeve part and collar to more accurately match the photos..

Looked interesting and I didn't feel like making something in this style because cotton has been difficult to get lately, and I'm disappointed but not surprised. I know measurements and figured that, surely, it's a typo, and they're not marketing a North American large as double XL. They are and it is, in fact, in the ballpark of a large by most manufacturers standards. If you're heavy set, or tall like me, then it's baggy in the sleeves but regular shirt size elsewhere. It is comfortable though, so if you don't fall outside of normal sizing then it's a nice regular shirt for the price. But unless you're tiny, then don't expect a torso to shirt ratio like you see in the pictures. I intend on letting the shoulders out as much as I can and converting it to a crop top.
Shirt is excellent quality and is the same as pictured, my son loves it !

I hate the material. They say it's 100% cotton, but it doesn't feel like cotton at all. It feels like polyester. It's the same material from kids costumes at Target or Kmart. If you want to waste money on something you thought you're gonna get, then this is the product for you
It's not baggy at all I got an XL and it's tight feels like a L definitely get a size up The fabric is nice and soft but not very thick
